thread.title: Trump bids farewell to Hope Hicks

title: Trump bids farewell to Hope Hicks
text:
Trump bids farewell to Hope Hicks 3:23pm EDT - 00:20 
President Trump bade a public farewell Thursday to long time aide and former communications director Hope Hicks ahead of her last day at the White House. Trump was departing for Ohio, then Mar-a-Lago and was not expected to return until after the Easter weekend. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
